While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!

description.en:
In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  
  
The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
description.hu:
Amerikában a régi vadnyugaton, a világ legnagyobb szabású versenye hamarosan kezdődik. Ezrek állnak rajzvonalhoz San Diegoban, hogy utazzanak több mint hat ezer kilómétert annak reményében, hogy megnyerhetik az ötven millió dolláros fődíjat. A lovak kora elérkezett a végéhez, így a versenyzők szabadon használhattak bármiféle járművet. A versenyzőknek el kell majd tűrniük a fárasztő körülményeket, naponta több mint, száz kilómétert megtéve felfedezetlen vidékeken. A Steel Ball Run egy igazán egyedülálló esemény.

A fiatalos Johnny Joestar, egy tolószékes korábbi lovas versenyző, eljött San Diegoba, hogy megnézze a verseny rajtját. Itt találkozik Gyro Zeppelivel, egy versenyzővel két acél golyóval a derekán fegyver helyett. Johnny szemtanúja lesz annak, hogy Gyro használja az egyik acélgolyóját, szabadjára engedve annak erejét, hogy arra kényszerítsen egy férfit egy párbaj közben, hogy lőjje le magát. Az ütközet közepette, Johnny megérinti az
acélgolyót és érezte, hogy egy erő végigáramlik a lábán, rábírva őt arra, hogy felálljon először két év után. Megfogadja, hogy rájön, hogy mi a titka az acélgolyóknak, Johnny eldönti, hogy indul a versenyen, így kezdődik el az ő bizarr kalandja Amerikán keresztül a Steel Ball Runban.
description.uk: Вересень 1980. Дикий Захід. Америка. Жокеї зі всього світу чекають гонку "Сталева Куля", яка ось-ось розпочнеться. Тисячі людей вишиковуються в Сан-Дієго, щоб подолати понад шість тисяч кілометрів заради шансу отримати головний приз — п’ятдесят мільйонів доларів. Юний Джонні Джостар, каліка, колишній жокей та популярний скакун, приїхав до Сан-Дієґо, щоб подивитися на старт перегонів. Там він зустрічає Джайро Цеппелі, гонщика з двома сталевими кулями на талії замість револьвера, звичної зброї для жителів. Джонні бачить, як Джайро використовує одну зі своїх сталевих куль, змушуючи людину вистрілити з рушниці в себе під час дуелі. Поклявшись знайти таємницю сталевих куль, Джонні вирішує взяти участь у гонці. Так і починається його химерна пригода.
description.pt-br: Nos Estados Unidos, na década de 1890, um homem chamado Steven Steel decide promover a "Steel Ball Run", uma corrida corta-mato cujo trajeto atravessa todo o país. A corrida é um grande atrativo mundial que chama a atenção tanto de corredores americanos como de corredores estrangeiros. Entre esses corredores estão Johnny Joestar, um ex-jóquei americano, e Gyro Zeppeli, um estrangeiro que carrega consigo misteriosas esferas de aço. Johnny e Gyro se esbarram e dão início à história da sétima parte de JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

altTitles.ja: ウソツキ！ゴクオーくん

description.en: The world is overflowing with them: fibs, falsehoods, lies… Surely you, too, Reader, have told a lie at least once in your life, with your heart beating fast. This is a story about dealing with those lies. The protagonist, Gokuoh, is a master liar, who loves both lying and exposing other people's lies. Together with his strange pet, Nekokarasu, he starts to expose the ocean of lies in his new school. Fighting lies with lies, all Gokuoh needs is the power of the "tongue." "What exactly does that mean?" you ask? Have a look and find out!

At the Spruce Tree Hospital, there’s a rather special patient. He’s been hidden in secret for two years by tree doctor So Iyeon, a man in a vegetative state.
“Please don’t wake up. Please, just don’t wake up.”
Her only wish was to live quietly, and every night, she prayed for this.
Then one day, whether by miracle or misfortune, the man in the coma awakens from his long sleep!
“Did you come here to suck off this worthless bastard?”
Faced with a man who has lost both his memory and common sense, she panics in fear of his murderous nature, and tells an irreversible lie.
“I’m Kwon Chaewoo’s... w-wife.”
The same man who, two years ago, buried someone alive in the mountains behind their house and tried to kill her!

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Au cœur d'une banlieue japonaise, se dressent face à face deux établissements que tout oppose : Chidori, le lycée public pour garçons, réunit les pires cancres de la ville, tandis que le prestigieux Kikyô rassemble les esprits les plus brillants des filles de bonne famille.

Donnant régulièrement un coup de main à la pâtisserie familiale, Rintarô Tsumugi, élève à Chidori, sympathise avec l'une de ses clientes régulières, Kaoruko Waguri. Alors qu'il sent peu à peu un lien se tisser entre eux, le lycéen apprend que la jeune fille fréquente Kikyô et que comme tous les élèves de ces établissements, ils sont supposés se haïr mutuellement ! La rivalité entre leurs lycées est-elle forcément signe de fatalité ?
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.vi: Ở một nơi nào đó, có 2 trường cao trung lân cận. Cao trung Chidori, một trường nam sinh cấp thấp hội tụ đủ những thằng đần, trường nữ sinh Kikyo, một trường nữ sinh danh giá . Rintaro Tsugumi, một nam sinh năm 2 to khỏe và trầm tính tại trường Chidori, bắt gặp Kaoruko Waguri, một khách hàng khi cậu đang giúp việc tại cửa hàng bánh nhà mình . Rintaro cảm thấy thoải mái khi dành thời gian bên Kaoruko, nhưng cô lại là học sinh của trường Kikyo, ngôi trường hàng xóm cực kì căm ghét trường Chidori. Đây là câu chuyện về 2 con người ở rất gần nhưng lại rất xa
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

title.en: SSS-Rank Paladin Who Transcends Common Sense

description.en: The game descended on reality, monsters run rampant, magical disasters overflow, everyone needs to choose a class and level up to become stronger. Zhou Yi who has been unremarkable until now awakened the S+ rank talent Protection of the Sacred Angel on the day of class awakening, turning his class into the hidden class Sacred Knight! Weapon blessing, angel blessing, honor blessing… With all sorts of buffs, Zhou Yi destroyed the space itself with just his aura. Who was it that said sacred knight is just a mundane class?
description.fr: Le jeu est entré dans la réalité, les monstres se déchaînent, les catastrophes magiques débordent, chacun doit choisir une classe et monter en niveau pour devenir plus fort. Zhou Yi, qui n'avait rien de remarquable jusqu'à présent, a éveillé le talent de rang S+ Protection de l'ange sacré le jour de l'éveil de classe, transformant sa classe en classe cachée Chevalier sacré ! Bénédiction de l'arme, bénédiction de l'ange, bénédiction de l'honneur... Avec toutes sortes d'améliorations, Zhou Yi détruisait l'espace lui-même avec sa seule aura. Qui a dit que le Chevalier sacré n'était qu'une classe banale ?
description.pt-br: O jogo emerge na realidade, os monstros correm desenfreados, os desastres mágicos transbordam, todos precisam escolher uma classe e subir de nível para aprimorarem a sua força. Zhou Yi, que tem sido uma pessoa normal até então, despertou o talento de classificação S+ "Proteção do Anjo Sagrado" no dia de despertar de classes, transformando sua classe na classe oculta "Cavaleiro Sagrado"! Bênção de arma, bênção do anjo, bênção de honra... Com todos os tipos de buffs, Zhou Yi destruiu o próprio espaço apenas com sua aura. Quem foi que disse que o paladino era uma classe mundana?

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !
description.ja: 樹木暦1294年。音が“見える”ラッパ手の少年・リュカは傭兵団に属しながらも戦争を嫌い、楽師になる事を夢見ていた。しかしある日、「枝憑き」と呼ばれる力が発現し、彼の運命は大きく動き出す――。

title.en: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu no Bunmei de Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku

altTitles.ja: 異世界黙示録マイノグーラ ～破滅の文明で始める世界征服～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界默示錄米諾戈拉 ～從滅亡的文明開始的世界征服～

altTitles.en: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin

description.en:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!
description.pl: Ira Takuto umiera w młodym wieku i budzi się w świecie przypominającym jego ulubioną grę 『Eternal Nations』 w której spotyka postać z gry, Atou. Razem postanawiają stworzyć własne królestwo.
description.pt-br: Eu reencarnei como um deus do mal. Ira Takuto sucumbiu à doença em tenra idade e acabou reencarnando em um mundo que lembrava o jogo de simulação de estratégia, “Eternal Nations”, do qual ele adorava jogar quando estava vivo. O que apareceu na frente dele foi Atou, uma garota pertencente à civilização do mal que eu costumava interpretar como “Mynoghra”. Os dois decidiram criar um novo país neste mundo mais uma vez.

description.en: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!
description.pt-br: À beira da morte, o guerreiro mais forte da humanidade, Ang, misteriosamente reencarna sessenta anos no futuro com a força do “Demônio mais Forte” — uma espada perigosa de dois gumes. Para resolver suas queixas e revelar a verdade, Ang não tem escolha a não ser “evoluir” continuamente em uma tentativa de fuga de seu destino passado. “Não vou deixar que eu me torne um demônio! Se quero sair, preciso confiar em mim mesmo!”

altTitles.ja: できそこないの姫君たち
でき姫

description.en: Fujishiro Nanaki is super cute, super popular, and super annoyed with anyone as plain as her classmate Kurokawa Kanade. When Nanaki finds out her boyfriend’s cheating on her, however, her life makes a complete 180—as does her relationship with Kanade. This all-new yuri manga series explores the budding romance between the cool girl in school and the “plain” girl she once brushed off!
description.pt-br: Nanaki-chan é a popular da escola, ela exalta sua beleza com a maior auto-estima e arrogância possível, ela é a princesinha fútil e imatura que acha que a aparência é fundamental. Mas um dia tudo isso vai por terra quando ela leva um pé na bunda gostosim do cara mais bonito e popular da escola. E pra piorar além de ser esculachada pelo zé bundão, tudo isso aconteceu na frente da mina que ela até então tirava uma onda por não ser tão vaidosa como ela… Só que dessa "tragédia" ela vai perceber que beleza nem sempre é tudo…

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

description.en: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.
description.ja: 魔物が蔓延り殺伐とした異世界。女騎士オリビアは、弟子の獣人ノアと暮らしていた。強く生きる2人の絆に癒され、キュンとする師弟の成長冒険譚。

description.en:
When playing a virtual reality game called Cang Lan, Xiao Wan gets pushed off a cliff. She ends up in another game world. What will happen to Xiao Wan?

- **Season 2:** Chapters 1-227+ (148-374+)

**Note:** Chapters 1-114 in Season 1 are in single page format. Starting with chapter 115, the page format switches to long strip.

altTitles.ja: れんげとなると！

description.en: It's been a few months since the neighborhood Chinese restaurant closed down, and when I stopped by for the first time in a while, I found that it had been transformed into a flashy, mysterious restaurant with its old signboard still intact. When I went inside, there was a gal there...
description.ja: 近所の町中華が閉店して数カ月、久々に立ち寄るとそこはかつての看板のまま、ド派手な謎の店に変わっていた。中に入るとそこには1人のギャルがいて……。ギャルがもてなす町中華の物語だ。
description.pt-br: Já se passaram alguns meses desde o fechamento do restaurante chinês do bairro, e quando passei por lá pela primeira vez em um tempo, descobri que ele tinha se transformado em um restaurante chamativo e misterioso, mantendo ainda seu antigo letreiro. Ao entrar, deparei-me com uma garçonete... Esta é uma história sobre um restaurante em Chinatown onde as garçonetes são acolhedoras.

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.zh: 长官，你的尾巴藏不住了

altTitles.en: Officer, You Can No Longer Hide Your Tail

description.en:
In the aftermath of the war, the world's hierarchy had been shaken up and enforced with an iron fist.
Once a high-ranking officer among the beastkin, Qing Ti ends up at very bottom—reduced to a mere plaything—and falls into the hands of her nemesis, Chen Xilan.
Just when people thought Qing Ti would be tormented to the point of wishing for her own death, the game of taming and being tamed had only started to begin.

After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス NINE PEAKS

description.en:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ja: 真汐樂(ましおがく)は父と2人暮らしの高校1年生。入学早々上級生と乱闘騒ぎを起こし停学処分となった矢先、突然の事故で父を亡くす。父の通夜の晩に、父との思い出である堤防釣りに出かけた樂は、海に落ち22年前にタイムリープしてしまう。そして樂を海から助けたのは、他ならぬ自分と同い年の父・春実だった。春実の両親(樂の祖父母)に気に入られた樂は、宮城樂として真汐家に居候することに。そして、祖父のはからいで父と同じ青波高校に通うことになる。22年前の玖嶺の街は不良だらけ。樂は父と2人でこの街の頂点を目指す!!
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

title.en: Kimi wa Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi o!

altTitles.ja: 君は喧し閉じてよ口を！

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ha Yakamashi Tojite yo Kuchi wo!

altTitles.en: You're Too Noisy, So Just Shut It Already!
You Talk Too Much, So Just Shut It Already!

altTitles.vi: Cậu Ồn Ào Quá, Im lặng Giùm Tớ Đi!

altTitles.ru: Ты слишком много говоришь, так что заткнись уже!

altTitles.tl: Ang Ingay Mo Kaya Manahimik Ka Na Lang!

description.en: Hiiragi Tsukino was born deaf. When she transfers to a new school, she meets a talkative boy named Taiyo Enomoto. Tsukino is slightly taken back by Taiyo, who talks to her without regard to the fact that she cannot hear. When she carefully reads the shape of his mouth, she finds that he is actually saying nothing but nonsense...?
description.ja: 柊月乃は生まれつき耳が聞こえない。そんな彼女が転校先で出会ったのは、おしゃべりな男子・榎本太陽。聞こえないことなんかお構いなしにしゃべりかけてくる太陽に若干引き気味な月乃。よくよく口の形を読んでみると、実はしょーもないことしか言ってなくないこの人…？
description.ru: Хиираги Цукино родилась глухой. Когда она переводится в новую школу, она встречает говорливого мальчика по имени Эномото Тайо. Цукино немного обескуражена тем, что Тайо разговаривает с ней, не заботясь о том, что она не может его слышать...
description.vi: Hiiragi Tsukino là một cô bạn bị khiếm thính bẩm sinh. Khi cậu ấy chuyển đến trường mới, cậu ấy gặp được một cậu bạn lắm mồm tên Enomoto Taiyo. Tại đây, Tsukino luôn bị xoay tròn bởi những câu chuyện xàm xí của Taiyo bất chấp việc cô không thể nghe được cậu ta nói gì.

description.en:
Based on the 2019 movie "Nezha"  
  
Over a thousand years, spiritual energy of the earth and heavens merged to form a Chaos Pearl. Yuanshi Tianzun refined it into a Demon Pill and a Spirit Pearl.  
  
The Spirit Pearl, which was supposed to be reincarnated into Nezha's body, was stolen by Shen Gongbao and given to the East Dragon King. As such, the Third Prince Aobing, the reincarnation of the Spirit Pearl, was born. Surrounding Aobing is a series of events about growth, and a battle against the Dragons that is beginning.

altTitles.ja: 色憑くモノクローム

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

title.en: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.

altTitles.ja: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。

altTitles.en: I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You

altTitles.zh: 替我父母偿还债务的条件是与日本最可爱的女高中生同居。

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì wǒ fùmǔ chánghuán zhàiwù de tiáojiàn shì yǔ rìběn zuì kě'ài de nǚ gāozhōng shēng tóngjū.

description.en:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — "In return for the loan, you have – to live with me."
"Why did that happen?!"

Yuya's daily life collapsed on this day.

"Yuya-kun. Let's take a bath together."
"Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow."
"That's enough, Hitotsuba-san!"
description.id: Tokoh utama, Yoshizumi Yuya, dipaksa untuk melunasi hutang yang ditinggalkan oleh orang tuanya yang melarikan diri ke luar negeri. Itu adalah teman sekelasnya, Hitotsuba Kaede, terpilih sebagai siswi terimut di Jepang, yang menyelamatkannya dari krisis hidup dan mati ini. Namun, ada motif tersembunyi di balik itu. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi sebagai imbalan untuk melunasi utangnya adalah — “Sebagai imbalan atas pinjaman itu, kau harus tinggal bersamaku.” “Kenapa jadi begitu?!” Kehidupan sehari-hari Yuya runtuh pada hari ini. “Yuya-kun. Ayo mandi bersama.” “Yuya-kun, jadilah bantal pelukku.” “Cukup, Hitotsuba-san!” Kisah cinta komedi romantis yang menggugah antara Hitotsuba Kaede yang cantik namun santai dan Yoshizumi Yuya yang serius dan keras kepala, dimulai sekarang!
description.ja: 両親が借金3000万を残して海外逃亡…！？追い詰められた吉住勇也の前に、不意に現れたのは社長令嬢の同級生・一葉楓。勇也も密かに憧れていた日本一可愛い女子高生1位に選ばれた楓は、彼女は意外な提案をするが

altTitles.ja: 宅配員のおねえさんがやってきた

title.en: Mobile Suit Cross Born Gundam DUST

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Cross Born Gundam DUST

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士クロスボーン・ガンダム DUST

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The year is 0169 of the Universal Century. The Earth Federation government has lost power, and the struggle for supremacy among the colonies has intensified, making it the "Space Sengoku Era". 

Ash King and other like-minded people stand up to put an end to the endless war!

Welcome to the World of "Ave Mujica"――. 

This comic is the official comic adaptation of TV anime "BanG Dream! Ave Mujica".“Give me the rest of your life?”

(From Comic Growl)
description.ja:
…ようこそ。Ave Mujicaの世界へ。

次世代ガールズバンドプロジェクト『BanG Dream!』より「Ave Mujica」をコミカライズ！ 

過去も素顔も仮面で覆い隠し、今宵も完璧な箱庭に降り立つ。
description.zh:
…欢迎来到 Ave Mujica 的世界。

该漫画是TV动画《BanG Dream!Ave Mujica》的官方漫画改编！ 「给我你的余生？」

description.en:
Two years ago, Yu Sui had his teammate sold out, and had himself criticized by the public. He didn't care about any of it. The only thing he cared about was the kid on his team, Shi Luo. After coming back to China, the two meet again. Yu Sui is starting a new team – will Shi Luo give himself once more to the one who hurt him before? Can there be a new path for their relationship?  
  
"I met you when we were young, and then I lost and found you again. My regrets vanished long ago."

altTitles.ja: 大ダーク

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ko: 오랜만에 친가에 돌아오니 동생이 TS되어 있었다

altTitles.ko-ro: Orenmane Chinga-e Doraoni Dongsaengi TSdoeeo Itteotda

When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?
description.ru: Когда я вернулся домой в первый раз спустя долгое время, мой младший брат стал девушкой!?

altTitles.ja: ニセモノの錬金術師

description.en:
In another world,
there was a person
who made their living
doing alchemy.

Alchemy × Sorcery × Slave × Elf × Reincarnation × God × Cheat × Battle……
A work packed with everything fantasy brought to life with overwhelming brushwork!
description.ja:
異世界で、
錬金術を生業とする
ひとりの人間が
おりました――。 

錬金術×呪術×奴隷×エルフ×転生×神様×チート×バトル……
ファンタジーのすべてが詰まった作品が、圧倒的筆致により連載開始！
description.pt-br:
Em outro mundo, havia uma pessoa que ganhava a vida fazendo alquimia.

Alquimia × Feitiçaria × Escrava × Elfa × Reencarnação × Deus × Trapaça × Batalha……

Uma obra repleta de tudo o que é fantasia e trazida à vida com uma pincelada impressionante!

altTitles.ja: ポンコツちゃん検証中

description.en:
Mito is a boy with a big heart and the frightening face of a thug. He wants people to rely on him, but he scares people off at first sight. That is, until his schoolmate Yumesaki asks him to help her.  
  
Yumesaki has a problem. Every day she is given a new, random supernatural ability by an mysterious being called God, as she has to test them in order to stop a giant meteorite that will destroy the planet in a year.  
  
Sure, the goal is to save the planet, but when a boy and a girl spend time together, there are more tender things to discover too!
description.es:
Mito es un muchacho con un corazón grande y con una cara de matón espeluznante. Quiere ayudar a la gente y que se apoyen en él, pero el asusta a la gente a primera vista. Eso, hasta que su compañera de clase Yumesaki le pide que le ayude.  
  
Yumesaki tiene un problema. Cada día le es otorgada una habilidad supernatural al azar de parte de un ente llamado Dios, pues debe probarlas con la meta de detener un meteorito enorme que destruirá el planeta en un año.  
  
Claro, la meta es salvar al planeta, ¡pero cuando un muchacho y una muchacha pasan tiempo juntos tienden a descubrir cosas mas tiernas también!

altTitles.ja: ユメかウツツか

description.en: The main character, Iroha, is a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to talk to others. Even though it’s been about two months since she started high school, she still hasn’t had a proper conversation with any of her classmates. During every break, she quietly slips out of the classroom and heads to the courtyard by the old school building. She does this to meet and talk with a senior she met at the town library while studying for exams. This senior, who is a year older, has become a source of support for Iroha. However, the two of them share a secret...
description.es: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...
description.fr: Iroha, le personnage principal, est un lycéen de première année qui a du mal à parler aux autres. Bien que deux mois se soient écoulés depuis son entrée au lycée, elle n'a encore jamais eu de véritable conversation avec l'un de ses collègues de classe. Durant la récréation, il sort de la classe en cachette et se rend dans la cour de récréation située à côté de l'ancien bâtiment scolaire. Elle le fait pour rencontrer un élève de terminale qu'elle a rencontré à la bibliothèque municipale alors qu'elle étudiait pour ses examens. Cet étudiant, qui a un an de plus qu'elle, est devenu une source de soutien pour Iroha. Cependant, toutes deux partagent un secret...
description.ja: 主人公は他人と会話することが苦手な高校1年生・いろは。高校入学から約2カ月、いまだクラスの人とまともに話せない彼女は、休み時間のたびに教室を抜け出しては旧校舎側の中庭に向かう。その目的とは、受験勉強をしているときに町の図書館で出会った1つ年上の先輩と話すこと。先輩との交流を支えに日々を過ごすいろはだが、2人にはある秘密があって……。
description.es-la: La protagonista, Iroha, es una estudiante de primer año de instituto a la que le cuesta hablar con los demás. Aunque han pasado dos meses desde que empezó el instituto, todavía no ha tenido una conversación adecuada con ninguno de sus compañeros. En los recreos, se escapa de clase y se dirige al patio, junto al antiguo edificio de la escuela. Lo hace para encontrarse y hablar con un estudiante de último curso que conoció en la biblioteca del pueblo mientras estudiaba para los exámenes. Este alumno, un año mayor que ella, se ha convertido en una fuente de apoyo para Iroha. Sin embargo, ambos comparten un secreto...

altTitles.ja: ビリーバット

altTitles.th: บิลลี่ แบ็ท

description.en:
Billy Bat is a comic-in-a-comic and the real protagonist is a Japanese-American artist named Kevin Yamagata who draws Billy Bat for "Marble Comics". Shortly after they transition to the artist in his studio with his assistant, two actual detectives, looking like Laurel and Hardy in Dick Tracy era suits and trench coats, knock on the door and appropriate Kevin's room for the purpose of conducting surveillance on a room in an adjacent building. 

One of the detectives, the skinny "Laurel", sees Kevin's work and it turns out he's a Billy Bat fan. The other chubby "Hardy" detective picks up a page saying that the characters look familiar and accuses Kevin of translating an old "Jap" comic.  
As Hardy remembers the comic he thinks Kevin is ripping off, we make another Urasawaesque time jump to 1949 Tokyo…
description.pl: "Billy Bat" przedstawia losy japońsko-amerykańskiego artysty Kevina Yamagaty, autora mangi o identycznym tytule co dzieło, w którym sam występuje, czyli "Billy Bat". Pracuje dla wydawnictwa "Marble Comics". Pewnego dnia do jego mieszkania pukają dwaj detektywi wyglądający jak Laurel Hardy z "Dick Tracy". Informują go, że otrzymali od gospodarza zezwolenie na przeprowadzenie śledztwa sąsiadującego budynku. Wkrótce jeden z detektywów, chudzielec Laurel, zauważa prace Kevina i okazuje się fanem "Billy'ego Bata", podczas gdy otyły Hardy podnosi pojedynczą stronę ze stwierdzeniem, iż komiks wygląda zadziwiająco podobnie do mangi publikowanej niegdyś przez Jumpa. Oskarża bohatera o kradzież tokijskiego dzieła z 1949 roku.
description.es-la:
Billy Bat es un cómic en un cómic y el verdadero protagonista es un artista japonés-americano llamado Kevin Yamagata que dibuja a Billy Bat para "Marble Comics". Poco después pasan al artista en su estudio con su ayudante, dos detectives reales que parecen Laurel y Hardy con trajes y gabardinas de la época de Dick Tracy, llaman a la puerta y se apropian de la habitación de Kevin con el fin de realizar una vigilancia en una habitación de un edificio adyacente. 

Uno de los detectives, el flaco "Laurel", ve el trabajo de Kevin y resulta que es un fanático de Billy Bat. El otro detective, el regordete "Hardy", coge una página diciendo que los personajes le resultan familiares y acusa a Kevin de traducir un viejo cómic "japonés".  
Mientras Hardy recuerda el cómic que cree que Kevin está copiando, hacemos otro salto temporal Urasawaesco al Tokio de 1949...
description.pt-br: Um detetive particular, é o protagonista da história em quadrinhos feita por Kevin Yamagata, um quadrinista americano, descendente de japoneses, famoso por sua história “Billy Bat”. O cotidiano de Kevin é abruptamente ado quando dois detetives entram no estúdio dele, a fim de investigar um vizinho acusado de espionagem. Um desses detetives vê o personagem Billy Bat e diz ter visto aquele desenho enquanto trabalhava no Japão. Suspeitando ter visto o personagem enquanto morava lá e o roubado inconscientemente, Kevin regressa ao Japão para buscar a verdade.

title.en: Zombie Sekai de Harem wo Tsukurou!

altTitles.ja: ゾンビ世界でハーレムをつくろう!

description.en: The world is on the brink of collapse due to the zombie threat. Meanwhile, I’m living the most thrilling and tantalizing days of my life! A high school boy who loves shogi and gaming discovers a mysterious power he possesses for the first time in this zombie-infested world.
description.ja: 世界は今、ゾンビの脅威で滅びかけている。俺は今、サイコーにエチエチな日々を過ごしている――。将棋とゲームが大好きなオタクな男子高校生が、ゾンビの世界になって初めて自分が持つ”ある力”を知った。

altTitles.ja: 四畳半のいばら姫

description.en:
*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment, attempted sexual assault, and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*

---

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again

title.en: A Wicked Tale of Cinderella's Stepmom

altTitles.fr: Il était une fois la belle-mère de Cendrillon

altTitles.th: ฉันเลี้ยงได้ My Cinderella

altTitles.ja: シンデレラを大切に育てました

altTitles.zh: 身为继母的我把灰姑娘养得很好

altTitles.zh-hk: 我把灰姑娘養得亭亭玉立

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đã Nuôi Dạy Cinderella Một Cách Tử Tế

description.en:
There is a famous fairytale. A kindhearted girl whose father and stepmother got married and became a family of five with her two stepsisters. The poor girl who was condemned by her stepmother and stepsisters when her father died. The very fairytale, Cinderella. But I am not Cinderella, I am the stepmother. At the age of thirty-seven, already married twice, been widowed twice and is raising three daughters!  
  
Daniel Walford, a man who keeps approaching me while I’m busy trying to raise my three daughters.  
“Can I kiss you?”  
As a son-in law, I think he’s a little bit older but why does he keep approaching?… Oh, I don’t know.  
Once I let Cinderella marry the prince, I can live quietly.  
But is this fairytale really ‘Cinderella’?

---

- Updates every Sunday in the Kakao Page
description.hu: Mind ismerjük a mesét: az üvegcipellőt, a közel-sem-szép mostohanővéreket, és a herceggel eltöltött éjszakát, amíg éjfélt nem üt az óra. Ebbe a mesébe reinkarnálódtam, de nem Hamupipőkeként, hanem a "gonosz" mostohaanyjának a testébe! A 37 évesen már kétszer megözvegyül és három lánnyal rendelkező Mildred célja az, hogy megfelelő partnert találjon nekik és boldogan élhessenek, amíg meg nem halnak... meg talán saját magának sem volna rossz a szép jövő! De mégis ki ez a fiatal és jóképű báró, aki folyton felkeresi?
description.ru: Есть популярная сказка. О доброй девушке, чей отец женился во второй раз. О том, как пятеро человек, включая двух сводных сестёр, стали одной, большой семьёй. Однако после смерти отца мачеха и сестры стали издеваться над бедной девушкой. Это история о Золушке. Но почему я попала не в тело Золушки, а в тело её мачехи? Я стала женщиной, которая за свои 37 лет, успела дважды побывать замужем и дважды стать вдовой. Той, кому приходится растить трёх дочерей, включая Золушку. В придачу ко всему этому, ко мне пристаёт мужчина по имени Даниэль! «Можно вас поцеловать?» Что ему от меня нужно? …Я совсем запуталась. Для начала нужно выдать Золушку за принца и начать спокойную жизнь. Но правда ли, что эта сказка о Золушке?

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.fr: Julian, un jeune esclave, s’embarque clandestinement sur un navire en quête de liberté. Il ne se doute pas de ce qui l’attend dans ces eaux maudites…
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

title.en: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 元暗殺者、転生して貴族の令嬢になりました

altTitles.en: A Former Assassin Was Reborn as a Blue-Blooded Daughter

description.en:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
description.ja:
任務に失敗した暗殺者が転生したのは、公爵令嬢のセレナ。「私は元暗殺者。なりすますなんて簡単だ」そう思っていたセレナだが、 頭がお花畑な母親や、彼女を蹴落とそうと周りを欺く義妹などとの感覚のズレに日々いら立ち、生きづらさを感じていた。 
マウントだらけのお茶会に、愛憎ドロドロな学園生活……周囲からの嫌がらせを冷めた目で痛烈にかわしながらも、その冷徹さゆえに疎まれ孤立していくセレナ。 そしてある日、義妹が第二王子と婚約することを知り、ついに家出を決意する。しかしそこに第一王子のエヴァンが現れて--!?
愛を知らない元暗殺者が貴族社会を突き進む、異世界転生コメディときどきラブ!？

altTitles.ja: 内海くんの恋のうた

description.en:
"Wouldn't you like to hear my love song?"

Shiori failed to make friends upon entering school, thus, she spends her time as a loner. The only support for her is the music of her favourite singer "Kanade," and she eagerly awaits the release of his new song. Then, by chance, she finds out that  this "Kanade" is actually her classmate, Utsumi! She can't believe she's about to meet her crush in real life, but to her suprise, once they're face to face, Utsumi asks her to be his girlfriend so he can experience love to be able to write a love song. 

A pure, heart-pounding love story that will make your heart skip a beat!

altTitles.ja: 現実主義勇者の王国再建記

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki

altTitles.en: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom
A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

altTitles.fr: Comment un Héro réaliste reconstruit un Royaume

altTitles.vi: Công Cuộc Tái Thiết Vương Quốc Của Anh Hùng Chủ Nghĩa Hiện Thực

description.en:
"O, Hero!"

With that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure - did not begin. 

After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! 

In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! 

What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?
description.fr: « Bonjour, Héros ». Après une convocation tout à fait banale dans un autre monde, Kazuya Souma se retrouve à l'aube d'une aventure épique–ou peux être pas. Après avoir présenté un plan pour renforcer économiquement et militairement le pays qui l'avait invoqué, le roi décide subitement de céder son trône à notre héros pour le meilleur et le pire, sans même demander l'avis de Kazuya. Et par-dessus tout, Kazuya se retrouva ainsi fiancé avec la propre fille de l'ancien roi. Afin d’obtenir un pays stable, il fera appel à tous les talents, les sages et les génies pour qu’ils soient à ses côtés. Cinq personnes se réunirent autour de Souma nouvellement couronné pour l’assister. Quels sont ces nombreux talents et les capacités qu’ils possèdent …!? Quelle sera la voie qu’il décidera d’emprunter pour ainsi révolutionner entièrement ce monde fantastique.
description.ja:
異世界に突如として勇者召喚された相馬一也。だが、彼の“勇者”としての冒険は――始まらなかった。国王から国家の抱える危機と課題を聞き出した彼は、持ち前の現代の知識を活かし富国強兵策を提案。すると……「召喚されし勇者ソーマ・カズヤに王位を譲る！」なんと、あろうことか国王より譲位されてしまう。さらに王女をソーマの婚約者にすると発表され――!?

若き国王ソーマと腹心の仲間とが共に国家の再興を目指す異世界本格内政ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.ja: 委員長とM子の百合

altTitles.en: Yuri Between the Class President and a Masochistic Girl
Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

altTitles.uk: Президентка Класу знайшла собі Слухняну Мазохістку

altTitles.tr: Sınıf başkanı ile mazoşist bir kız arasındaki yuri

altTitles.id: Kisah Bakung Antara Ketua Kelas dan Gadis Masokis

title.ja: Clevatess -Majuu no Ou to Akago to Shikabane no Yuusha-

altTitles.ja: クレバテス－魔獣の王と赤子と屍の勇者－
Clevatess -The King of Devil Beast, The baby, and The Brave of Undead-

altTitles.en: Clevatess -The Devil Beast King, The Baby, & The Corpse Hero-
Clevatess - The King of Devil Beasts, the Baby, and the Brave of the Undead

altTitles.pt-br: Clevatess - O Rei das Feras Diabólicas, O bebê e a Valente Heróina Morta-Viva

description.en:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king.
Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.

Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)
description.pt-br: Ele matou os heróis, matou o rei, a fera demoníaca então encontrou o “bebê do destino”… Tendo intelecto superior e poder destrutivo, tal é Clevatess, o rei das feras demoníacas. Irritado com os 13 heróis encarregados de tirar sua vida, ele decidiu arruinar a humanidade, mas foi encarregado de um incômodo inesperado: um bebê humano recém-nascido. É a história de um mundo próximo do fim, perto do apocalipse, ou o diário dos cuidados infantis da nova era?

altTitles.en: Ordinary Happy Family Life in Another World
Ordinary Happy Family Life in Another World: I'm Reincarnated, so I'll Live Happily This Time

altTitles.ja-ro: Tada Shiawasena Isekai Kazoku Seikatsu: Tensei Shite Kondokoso Shiawase ni Kurashimasu

altTitles.ja: ただ幸せな異世界家族生活
ただ幸せな異世界家族生活 ～転生して今度こそ幸せに暮らします～

description.en:
Araki Susumu, a salaryman who has been working ceaselessly without caring for his family, loses consciousness on his birthday and is reincarnated in another world as "Tidus", the son of a couple named Dee and Tin. Regretting his previous life, Tidus begins to work on the development of his village from an early age to live happily with his family this time. Taking advantage of his father's position as head of the village, he teaches the children around him how to write and creates new special products from the blessings of nature. However, some forces want to take advantage of his success…   
  
" I hope and pray that the ones around me will be happy."  
  
This is the story of a young boy who starts his second life to make his family happy.

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1321ed/)  (jp)

altTitles.ja: 愛と呪い

description.en: A semi-autobiographical account of the author as she experiences abuse, sexual and otherwise, at the hands of her family who are also deeply religious. Aiko wished for someone to kill her and the world she lives in. With the Great Hanshin Earthquake, the Aleph doomsday cult, and the Kobe child murders, it seemed like the ends of time was approaching. Unable to dream of "somewhere away from here", all she can do is face her violent life head-on.
description.es-la: Historia semi-autobiográfico de la autora mientras sufre abusos sexuales y otro tipo de cosas, a manos de su familia, que también es profundamente religiosa. Aiko deseaba que alguien acabara con ella y con el mundo en el que vive. Con el Gran Terremoto de Hanshin, la secta del Juicio Final Aleph y los asesinatos de niños de Kobe, parecía que se acercaba el fin de los tiempos. Incapaz de soñar con "algún lugar lejos de aquí", lo único que puede hacer es enfrentarse de frente a su violenta vida.

title.en: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita

altTitles.ja: ネットの『推し』とリアルの『推し』が隣に引っ越してきた

altTitles.en: My Fave Persons Moved into Condominium Where I Live

description.en:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...
description.ja: 無為な日々を過ごす天童蒼馬には二人の『推し』がいる。ネットの『推し』大人気VTuberのアンリエッタ。リアルの『推し』アイドル声優の八住ひより。二人への推し活を生きがいに大学生活を送るはずが……なんと隣の部屋に『推し』の一人が引っ越してきて!?夢のような展開に胸を躍らせる蒼馬だったが、目の当たりにしたのは残念すぎる『推し』の本性で――。
description.vi: Vtuber nhà rác... Seiyuu Idol bợm rượu... Bạn thuở nhỏ Yandere... Ai sẽ là người chiến thắng

altTitles.ja: 青春ヘビーローテーション

description.en:
Nao falls in love at first sight with the hottie prince Haruna-kun, who helps her overcome anxiety during the high school entrance examination. She safely gets into high school and feels that she’s fated to the guy sitting next to her. However, Haruna-kun is very popular and has a habit of saying “I hate girls who tell me they like me.”. Even so, Haruna-kun still messes with Nao.
Nao gradually falls in love with him as she gets to know him better. Haruna-kun may look mean, but he’s actually very kind.
description.es-la: Nao se enamora a primera vista del príncipe Haruna-kun, quien la ayuda a superar la ansiedad durante el examen de ingreso a la escuela preparatoria. Ella ingresa sana y salva a la preparatoria y siente que es el destino que el chico que la ayudó se sentará a su lado. Sin embargo, Haruna-kun es muy popular y tiene la costumbre de decir: "Odio a las chicas que me dicen que les gusto". Aun así, Haruna-kun todavía se involucra con Nao. Nao poco a poco se enamora de él a medida que lo va conociendo mejor. Haruna-kun puede parecer malo pero en realidad es muy amable.

title.en: Mori Kaoru Shuuishuu - Anything and Something

altTitles.ja-ro: Mori Kaoru Shuuishuu: Anything and Something

altTitles.ja: 森薫拾遺集

description.en: At times hilarious, at others heartwarming, this collection of short stories penned by one of Japan's most talented artists is a perfect addition to any library! A young girl discovers that new glasses give her a whole new perspective on the world, a bunny-girl waitress learns to cope with her male customers with dignity, an introverted art student inspires her fellow club members even as she takes inspiration from them, and more! Fans of Mori will enjoy seeing concept designs and historical notes from her award-winning series, Emma and A Bride's Story, as well as Mori's own brand of enthusiastic commentary throughout.

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトと一緒に住むことになってしまった
よもやまこばなし

altTitles.en: Ended Up Living with a Classmate

altTitles.ru: В итоге пришлось жить с одноклассницей

description.en: It's a collection of short manga stories about interacting with a girl, sometimes romantically and sometimes not.
description.ru:
Это сборник коротких историй о взаимодействии с девушками, романтических и не только. 
1. В итоге пришлось жить с одноклассницей - История о Юсукэ и Минами.

altTitles.ja: 私に愛を叫ばせて

description.en:
"Do you agree with this love, or are you very much against it?" 

What would you do if you finally found the love of your dreams but it is someone you shouldn't have fallen in love with? 

Ichibana is a girl who is a little bit girly and a little bit hot-tempered. She falls in love with Maki, a plain boy in her class, but just as she is about to confess her feelings to him, she finds out, to her surprise that he has a girlfriend!
description.ja:
「君に愛されたいと想い続けるのは罪なことですか――…？」　

主人公・一花は、ちょいギャルでちょっと気の多い女子。同じクラスの地味目男子・槇くんに恋をするのですが、勢いで告白しようとした矢先、意外にも（失礼！）

槇くんには彼女がいることが発覚！　

彼女持ちに恋するなんて辛いだけ！と思うのだけど――!?　

あなたは恋に賛成？反対？　

きれいごとだけじゃない本音のラブコメディ！
